query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `instrumentationAdvice` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `trackId` int NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `targetState` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `adviceJson` json NOT NULL,
  `artistNotes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `instrumentationAdvice_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `idx_instrAdvice_trackId` (`trackId`),
  INDEX `idx_instrAdvice_userId` (`userId`),
  INDEX `idx_instrAdvice_trackId_target` (`trackId`, `targetState`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`trackId`) REFERENCES `tracks`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2yoFfYif5LNxbni.536e2831ff0e --database ZpobkhoyuogEaApEUcL3SK --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `instrumentationAdvice` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `trackId` int NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `targetState` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `adviceJson` json NOT NULL,
  `artistNotes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `instrumentationAdvice_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `idx_instrAdvice_trackId` (`trackId`),
  INDEX `idx_instrAdvice_userId` (`userId`),
  INDEX `idx_instrAdvice_trackId_target` (`trackId`, `targetState`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`trackId`) REFERENCES `tracks`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
